name: AbacusExercise
0:
”Alexa ask abacus exercise”
”Alexa do abacus exercise”
”Alexa start abacus exercise”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: abacus exercise
des:
this is Abacus exercise application, 
We use the abacus because it is an invaluable tool to help understand mental mathematics. Some people have difficulty grasping arithmetic because it is not something they can see or touch. By working with beads on the abacus, math becomes something one can understand quick.
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Abacus
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
